name: object-hub
description: Object Hub for object synchronization between server and clients

scripts.build: npm run build-unminified; npm run build-minified
scripts.build-unminified: parcel build client-side/src/oh.js --out-dir client-side/dist --out-file oh.js --global OH --no-minify
scripts.build-minified: parcel build client-side/src/oh.js --out-dir client-side/dist --out-file oh.min.js --global OH

author: Noam Lin
